column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Soldier # 4 says : " It 's Kuvira .
#Text=Let me talk to her .
#Text=" Raiko says : " Kuvira , this is Raiko .
#Text=What kind of game are you playing ?
#Text=You told me you would send Baatar over with your terms , and then he does n't show .
#Text=" Kuvira says : " What do you mean , " he did n't show " ?
#Text=" Raiko says : " According to your people , he 's not on the airship .
#Text=" Kuvira says : " If he 's not on the airship , then where is he ?
#Text=" Baatar Jr. says : " Kuvira ?
#Text=It 's Baatar .
#Text=I 've been captured .
#Text=My airship was ambushed and I was taken by force .
#Text=Korra refuses to release me unless we back down and leave the city .
#Text=" Kuvira says : " Are you injured ?
#Text=" Baatar Jr. says : " I 'm fine .
#Text=" Kuvira says : " Is the Avatar there with you now ?
#Text=" Baatar Jr. says : " Yes , everyone is here .
#Text=" Kuvira says : " Find out where that signal 's coming from .
#Text=" Baatar Jr. says : " Listen to me .
#Text=If you try to take Republic City , the Avatar will never let me see you again ... and I refuse to live that way .
#Text=Forget the United Republic ; we have our empire !
#Text=We have each other !
#Text=Let 's go back home and get married .
#Text=The only thing that matters is that we 're together for the rest of our lives .
#Text="
